archimate:Product.name: MUXViz
archimate:Product.documentation:
MUXViz: a framework for network multi-layer analysis and interactive visualization. MuxViz is based on R and GNU Octave, running on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.
a framework for the analysis and visualization of interconnected multilayer networks. It is released under the GNU General Public License v3.0.
at http://muxviz.net/ Installed with Docker. Some issue with visualization of graphs. Data analytics oriented so requires mathematics background
